title: Calendar download.
content: I am trying to follow instructions to upload my calendar to Thunderbird and I thought I had done so, but when I click 'continue', nothing happens. I am NOT computer literate, so if anyone replies to this issue, please do so as if you wrote a chapter in ".............. For Idiots". Thank you.
creator: brutuslain

title: Thunderbird NOT WORKING
content: Thunderbird has pretty much disappeared from my iMac, and I cannot find a way to solve this problem. I've restarted Thurnderbird multiple times and restarted the iMac. It came out of nowhere, and I do not know what to do. I've attached a screenshot with the screen that pops up when I open Thunderbird. None of the dropdown menus work, and I cannot access my years of email. Help!
creator: renee.colle

title: Adding att.net
content: I am having issues adding att email to Thunderbird. I input my email account info and it comes back as a good account. Then I hit continue and after a few minutes it states the username or password is incorrect. I even changed the protocol from POP3 to IMAP and it won't let me.
creator: emt1964@att.net

title: Eliminating unwanted default folders
content: I want to get rid of the spam and archive folders, to free up real estate. I can specify that I don't want anything archived, but that doesn't get rid of the archive folders. I can undo the default adaptive spam filtering and set up my own "delete" filters, but I don't know how to remove the spam folders from my edresses. Are there ways to do this? I prefer the older design, though I understand that some users want those folders.
creator: safety-first

title: Cannot start Thunderbird
content:
Bonjour, Thunderbird/ Windows 10 home /64bits 1 Depuis 2025/03/15 Envoi de mail impossible (réception OK) 2 J'effectue 2025/03/17 une restauration de Windows au 2025/03/12, date du dernier message envoyé sans problème. 3 La restauration dure plus de 6 heures ! mais j'ai un pop up Microsoft qui confirme la bonne exécution. 4 Je vérifie le fonctionnement général : Internet OK, profil Thunderbird OK, Points de restauration antérieurs au 2025/03/17 disparus; compte tenu de la durée exceptionnellement longue de la restauration je pense que windows a dû procéder à quelques réparations..il semble d'ailleurs un peu plus "agile". 5 J'effectue une double sauvegarde de mes données (profil TDB inclus), au cas où... 6 Je démarre Thunderbird , ECHEC !; message "Couldnot load XPCOM".

Je propose de désinstaller TDB puis de le réinstaller; qu'en pensez vous ?

MERCI d'avance
creator: tutujan
